title: The Devil Wears Prada
description: A young journalist lands a job as an assistant to a demanding fashion magazine editor, learning harsh lessons about ambition and self-worth.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Black Swan
description: A committed ballerina wins the lead role in 'Swan Lake' but slowly loses her mind as she strives for perfection.

title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
description: The life story of Nelson Mandela, from his early years to becoming South Africa's first Black president.

title: Frida
description: A look at the professional and private life of surrealist Mexican painter Frida Kahlo.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
description: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums becomes a contestant on the Indian version of 'Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?' and exceeds expectations.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he begins to uncover some long-held family secrets.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of a manipulative cannibal to catch another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: Farewell My Concubine
description: Spanning over fifty years, two Peking Opera actors forge a complex relationship amidst political turmoil in 20th-century China.

title: The Intouchables
description: After becoming a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, a wealthy man hires a young ex-convict as his caregiver, forging an unlikely friendship.
